name: Remedy
description:
Health has a bad reputation. Most of us view it as boring, burdensome, and something to think about only when sick. Many health-related brands unwittingly perpetuate this mindset, through a tired point of view and expression.Â 
Since 1989, Remedy has aspired to a singular vision: to change how people think about health. Informed always by the voice of the customer, we help clients create provocative brand experiences that inspire others.
